subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ thrashing of the Reds in the first game of a doubleheader reminded them how simple baseball can be sometimes. In the nightcap, though, the Mets were reminded of the other side of the game.
snippet: The Mets’ thrashing of the Reds in the first game of a doubleheader reminded them how simple baseball can be sometimes. In the nightcap, though, the Mets were reminded of the other side of the game.
